title: Since when could i not cleanse malz ult
body: What exactly is the purpose of cleanse if you can't use it to get out of malz ult??? Like no one uses it but I got it just to go against malz and I got dumpstered cus I didn't know I couldn't cleanse out of it. The cd is as long as any other spells as well... Like its the only summoner spell to get rid of cc and its so useless... Riot pls buff cleanse...

replies.body: Due to Malz ult being a suppression, cleanse will not work against it. Similarly it will not work against WW and urgot ults. You can, however use QSS on it.
